summary: Re-research confirms research-001.md was largely accurate. The blocking axiom is singleFamily_modal_backward_axiom (Construction.lean:228). saturated_modal_backward is FULLY PROVEN in ModalSaturation.lean. The gap is constructing a saturated BMCS from context. Identified misleading omega-rule comments in TruthLemma.lean (Task 858 targets these). Recommended path: WeakCoherentBundle approach (32-48 hours estimated).
